content:
#4274 is about creating a glossary.

@Danny Ebanks just pointed out our definition of a dataset at under "definitions" at https://support.dataverse.harvard.edu/harvard-dataverse-general-terms-use . This might be a good resource for us.
I like the idea, just not sure about how to ever get consensus on the definitions. So, if we do it, I would keep it pretty short and as general as possible.
If people don't like the definitions, they can open an issue or make a pull request! :smile:
